name: Failed MSExchange Transport Agent Installation
description: Detects a failed installation of a Exchange Transport Agent
false_positives: Legitimate installations of exchange TransportAgents. AssemblyPath is a good indicator for this.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:MSExchange\ Management AND event.code:6 AND Data:*Install\-TransportAgent*)`
